#summary Instructions on accessing the source code using subversion repositories.
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Subversion Services =

  * [http://svn.ezcommunity.net/ svn.ezcommunity.net]
  * [http://svn.web.ezcommunity.net/ svn.web.ezcommunity.net]

= Repositories =

  * [http://svn.ezcommunity.net/src/ezcommunity http://svn.ezcommunity.net/src/ezcommunity]
  * [http://svn.ezcommunity.net/src/ezcommunity-contributions http://svn.ezcommunity.net/src/ezcommunity-contributions]

= Checking out the source code =

Here is an example command to checkout the source code

{{{
svn co http://svn.ezcommunity.net/src/ezcommunity/trunk /web/pro/ezpublish
}}}
